title: nf-core/riboseq pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample ID must be provided and must be a string that cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

strandedness.errorMessage: Strandedness must be provided and be one of 'auto', 'forward', 'reverse' or 'unstranded'

type.errorMessage: Sample type must be provided and be one of 'riboseq', 'rnaseq' or 'tiseq'

sample_description.errorMessage: Sample description must be a string

pair.errorMessage: Pair information must be a string
pair.description: Sample pairing information for paired analysis

treatment.errorMessage: Treatment information must be a string
